title: Schlussakkord (1936) Final Accord Douglas Sirk Lil Dagover
description:
Amerika, that fantasy land beloved of Franz Kafka, Luis Trenker and others, is he first thing we see in this movie - before the scene shifts back to Germany, as an emigrant woman returns to the son she had given up. He is now a successful conductor, and she becomes a nanny to his family. This gives an excuse for many orchestral interludes.

Douglas Sirk became famous in Hollywood for his lush melodramas, it is even said that TV soap-operas were inspired by his work (which however is of much higher quality). Here we see that he was working in this genre while in Germany, also that he had an interest in the new world (which we also see in La Habanera, Zu Neuen Ufern and others.

I can't find any subtitles, so it will help if you have some German.
